tage - package tage
The TAGE core game engine classes.
tage.ai.behaviortrees - package tage.ai.behaviortrees
 
tage.audio - package tage.audio
Wrapper for the audio package JOAL.

tage.input - package tage.input
For managing input devices such as a gamepad.

Classes for building application layer network protocols.
tage.networking.client - package tage.networking.client
 
tage.networking.server - package tage.networking.server
 
tage.nodeControllers - package tage.nodeControllers
Classes for the built-in scenenode controllers.
tage.objectRenderers - package tage.objectRenderers
Classes containing the actual OpenGL rendering code.
tage.physics - package tage.physics
A physics wrapper for LibBulletJme.
tage.rml - package tage.rml
RML is a math library used ONLY for animation, and should NOT be used by the application.
tage.shapes - package tage.shapes
Classes for the various object shapes supported by TAGE.

TCPClientSocket - Class in tage.networking.client
A client socket for sending and receiving packets using the TCP protocol.
TCPClientSocket() - Constructor for class tage.networking.client.TCPClientSocket
Constructor to create an unconnected client socket.
TCPClientSocket(String, int) - Constructor for class tage.networking.client.TCPClientSocket
Constructs a socket connected to the remote address and remote port.
TCPClientSocket(String, int, InetAddress, int) - Constructor for class tage.networking.client.TCPClientSocket
Constructs a socket bound to the local address, local port and connected to the remote address and remote port.
TCPClientSocket(InetAddress, int) - Constructor for class tage.networking.client.TCPClientSocket
Constructs a socket connected to the remote address and port specified.
TCPClientSocket(InetAddress, int, InetAddress, int) - Constructor for class tage.networking.client.TCPClientSocket
Constructs a socket bound to the local address, local port and connected to the remote address and remote port.

TCPServerSocket(int, GameConnectionServer) - Constructor for class tage.networking.server.TCPServerSocket

TerrainPlane - Class in tage.shapes
TerrainPlane is a plane with a large number of vertices, intended for height mapping.
TerrainPlane() - Constructor for class tage.shapes.TerrainPlane
sets default precision of 100, or 10,000 vertices.
TerrainPlane(int) - Constructor for class tage.shapes.TerrainPlane
precision is number of vertices along each axis.

Torus - Class in tage.shapes
Torus is described in Chapter 6 of Computer Graphics Programming in OpenGL with Java.
Torus() - Constructor for class tage.shapes.Torus
The no-parameter contructor specifies a default precision of 48, inner radius=0.6, outer radius=0.25.
Torus(float, float, int) - Constructor for class tage.shapes.Torus
parameters are inner radius, outer radius, and precision=48.
